data.eml:eml: Six new species of Prozercon Sellnick, 1943 (Acari, Mesostigmata, Zerconidae) from Greece, with remarks on the genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ujvári, Zsolt (2011): Six new species of Prozercon Sellnick, 1943 (Acari, Mesostigmata, Zerconidae) from Greece, with remarks on the genus. Zootaxa 2785: 1-31, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.201023
